mapper.select: select m.match_id, m.course_id, m.author_id, m.match_title, DATE_FORMAT(m.travel_start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as travel_start_date , DATE_FORMAT(m.travel_end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as travel_end_date , m.max_people, m.gender_type,DATE_FORMAT(m.deadline, '%Y-%m-%d') as deadline, m.hit, m.register_time, m.deleted, m.content, mem.nickname from matches m join members mem on m.author_id = mem.member_id where m.match_id = #{matchId}
SELECT h.hashtag_name FROM match_hashtag mh JOIN hashtags h ON mh.hashtag_id = h.hashtag_id WHERE mh.match_id = #{matchId}
select m.* from match_members mm join matches m on mm.match_id = m.match_id where mm.member_id = #{memberId} and m.travel_end_date >= current_date()

select * from matches where 1=1
and match_title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY match_id DESC
ORDER BY hit DESC
ORDER BY match_id DESC
limit #{start}, #{listsize}
mapper.insert: insert into matches (course_id, author_id, match_title, travel_start_date, travel_end_date, max_people, gender_type, deadline, hit, register_time, deleted, content) values (#{courseId}, #{authorId}, #{matchTitle}, #{travelStartDate}, #{travelEndDate}, #{maxPeople}, #{genderType}, #{deadline}, #{hit}, now(), #{deleted}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT hashtag_id AS hashtagId, hashtag_name AS hashtagName FROM hashtags WHERE hashtag_name = #{hashtagName}
